abstract: Wall Street investors sold off on Thursday as light trading amplified concerns about foreign debt and a weaker-than-expected report on the U.S. labor market.
snippet: Wall Street investors sold off on Thursday as light trading amplified concerns about foreign debt and a weaker-than-expected report on the U.S. labor market.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street investors sold off on Thursday as light trading amplified concerns about foreign debt and a weaker-than-expected report on the labor market.

headline.main: Dow Slips for Third Day, but Dollar Strengthens
